scripts.make:zstd: npm run prebuild && cd zstd && docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/src -u $(id -u):$(id -g) emscripten/emsdk emmake make lib-release
scripts.build:wasm: npm run make:zstd && cd zstd && docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/src -u $(id -u):$(id -g) emscripten/emsdk emcc -flto -o ./zstd.js -O3 --memory-init-file 0 --post-js export_module.js -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS="['_ZSTD_isError', '_ZSTD_getFrameContentSize', '_ZSTD_getErrorName', '_ZSTD_decompress', '_ZSTD_compress', '_ZSTD_compressBound']" -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS="['cwrap', 'destroy_buffer', 'create_buffer']" -s FILESYSTEM=0 -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 lib/libzstd.so && npm run copy
